prudence.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a sensible and careful attitude that makes you avoid unnecessary risks
prudence.translation[1].definitions[0].d: when you are sensible and careful to avoid unnecessary risks
prudence.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Their financial reserves have been built up over many years through a combination of prudence and innovation.
prudence.translation[1].definitions[1].d: the rule that a business should not state an asset value, possible profit etc to be bigger, or a possible loss to be smaller, than it actually might be
